title: In phantom game
body: I finished a game just before, and went back in queue. It then said I couldn't join queue because I was already assigned to a game, so I restarted the client. After I logged in, I got taken to the Game Abandoned screen. When I try to reconnect, it goes to a black screen for a little bit before telling me I've crashed due to a bad network connection. When I retry it does the same thing. I've reloaded the client 3 times and it's still doing it, telling me to rejoin the game I abandoned. But I finished the bloody thing. I'm loving URF, please help me.

replies.body:
Seems you experienced a ghost game. This happens when the game server you were playing on fails to communicate the game-end message to PVP.Net.

The ghost game will usually last a maximum of 2 hours after this occurs. Sometimes this issue can be fixed by relogging into League of Legends. Occasionally, restarting your computer may help. These actions force the client to request a new update.

Seems to be happening to quite a few people atm.
